--------------------------------------------------------------------------- SQSError Traceback (most recent call last) in () ----> 1 user.sqs.connection.get_queue_attributes(first_queue) /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/boto-2.41.0-py2.7.egg/boto/sqs/connection.pyc in get_queue_attributes(self, queue, attribute) 156 params = {'AttributeName' : attribute} 157 return self.get_object('GetQueueAttributes', params, --> 158 Attributes, queue.id) 159 160 def set_queue_attribute(self, queue, attribute, value): /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/boto-2.41.0-py2.7.egg/boto/connection.pyc in get_object(self, action, params, cls, path, parent, verb) 1206 boto.log.error('%s %s' % (response.status, response.reason)) 1207 boto.log.error('%s' % body) -> 1208 raise self.ResponseError(response.status, response.reason, body) 1209 1210 def get_status(self, action, params, path='/', parent=None, verb='GET'): SQSError: SQSError: 404 Not Found 404 Not Foundunknownunknown {code} However, whats even more interesting, is that if AWS CLI (1.11.32) is used, everything works as expected. {code} [root@d-02 ~]# aws --endpoint-url http://sqs.e-13.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ sqs get-queue-attributes --queue-url http://simplequeue.e-13.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/000846449315/nephoria-test-queue --attribute-names All --profile devops-admin { "Attributes": { "ApproximateNumberOfMessagesNotVisible": "0", "VisibilityTimeout": "30", "ApproximateNumberOfMessagesDelayed": "0", "MaximumMessageSize": "262144", "CreatedTimestamp": "1482311071", "ApproximateNumberOfMessages": "0", "ReceiveMessageWaitTimeSeconds": "0", "DelaySeconds": "0", "MessageRetentionPeriod": "345600", "LastModifiedTimestamp": "1482311071", "QueueArn": "arn:aws:sqs:eucalyptus:000846449315:nephoria-test-queue" } } {code} *Additional Information* If I try the same boto method inside nephoria against AWS, everything works as expected: {code} In [25]: user_aws.user.sqs.connection.get_queue_attributes(queues[0]) 2016-12-21 19:39:07,773 boto [DEBUG] Method: GET 2016-12-21 19:39:07,773 boto [DEBUG]:Method: GET 2016-12-21 19:39:07,773 boto [DEBUG] comments.body: Example of output using {{basic_queue_test_suite.py}} against Eucalyptus 4.4 (4.4.0-0.25694.619.20161231git573562d.el7). In order to see more debugging from the boto call, replace {{INFO}} with {{DEBUG}} for the {{\--boto-loglevel}} option: {code} # python nephoria/testcases/sqs/basic_queue_test_suite.py --clc 10.111.1.72 --password foobar --boto-loglevel INFO [01-03 17:23:02][INFO][BasicQueueTests]: TEST CASE INFO +------------------+-----------------+ | NAME | BasicQueueTests | | TEST LIST | [] | | ENVIRONMENT FILE | None | +------------------+-----------------+ [01-03 17:23:02][INFO][BasicQueueTests]: +------------------+-------------------------------+ | TEST ARGS | VALUE | +------------------+-------------------------------+ | access_key | None | | boto_loglevel | INFO | | clc | 10.111.1.72 | | configsections | ['BasicQueueTests', 'global'] | | domain_name | None | | dry_run | False | | emi | None | | environment_file | None | | log_file | None | | log_file_level | DEBUG | | log_level | DEBUG | | no_clean | False | | password | foobar | | queue_name | None | | region | None | | secret_key | None | | test_account | testrunner | | test_list | None | | test_regex | None | | test_user | admin | | vmtype | c1.medium | | zone | None | +------------------+-------------------------------+ [01-03 17:23:02][DEBUG][BasicQueueTests]: Creating TestUnit: "test_create_queue" with args: [01-03 17:23:02][DEBUG][BasicQueueTests]: Attempting to populate testunit:test_create_queue, with testcase.args... There was an issue where the request did not get accepted by the service when the url path was used to specify the queue, this is now working as expected:

{code}
#
# aws --endpoint http://sqs.d-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ sqs create-queue --queue-name foo
{
    "QueueUrl": "http://simplequeue.d-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/000968877309/foo"
}
# 
# 
# aws --endpoint http://sqs.d-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ sqs get-queue-attributes --attribute All --queue-url http://simplequeue.d-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/000968877309/foo
{
    "Attributes": {
        "ApproximateNumberOfMessagesNotVisible": "0", 
        "VisibilityTimeout": "30", 
        "ApproximateNumberOfMessagesDelayed": "0", 
        "MaximumMessageSize": "262144", 
        "CreatedTimestamp": "1484027389", 
        "ApproximateNumberOfMessages": "0", 
        "ReceiveMessageWaitTimeSeconds": "0", 
        "DelaySeconds": "0", 
        "MessageRetentionPeriod": "345600", 
        "LastModifiedTimestamp": "1484027389", 
        "QueueArn": "arn:aws:sqs:eucalyptus:000968877309:foo"
    }
}
# 
# 
# aws --endpoint http://sqs.d-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/000968877309/foo sqs get-queue-attributes --attribute All --queue-url http://simplequeue.d-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/000968877309/foo
{
    "Attributes": {
        "ApproximateNumberOfMessagesNotVisible": "0", 
        "VisibilityTimeout": "30", 
        "ApproximateNumberOfMessagesDelayed": "0", 
        "MaximumMessageSize": "262144", 
        "CreatedTimestamp": "1484027389", 
        "ApproximateNumberOfMessages": "0", 
        "ReceiveMessageWaitTimeSeconds": "0", 
        "DelaySeconds": "0", 
        "MessageRetentionPeriod": "345600", 
        "LastModifiedTimestamp": "1484027389", 
        "QueueArn": "arn:aws:sqs:eucalyptus:000968877309:foo"
    }
}
{code}

so endpoints such as "http://sqs.d-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/000968877309/foo" are now working.
